title: Ok Katarina is pretty dumb right now
body: Game overall is unplayable. Too much broken shit.

replies.body:
kat is so easy to 1 shot if you can land a stun/knockup
plus she doesn't have lifesteal, so she has no means of health regen

Welcome to preseason, first time here?

AP warwick, gone but never forgotten (sadly).
Really? I feel like she's not that great since you predict where her daggers drop. Her ult still does a ton of damage so I guess... You don't need to rely too much on your other abilities lol.
Surprisingly she actually takes skill after the re-work.
Just say you don't know how to use her.

PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT

My sides, oh god help me
